vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
συμπάσχω,
have the same thing happen to one, οἱ τοὺς Χασμωμένους.. ὁρῶντες ταὐτὸν τοῦτο σ. [NT+5th c.BC+]
__II with dative, to be affected in common with, ἀλλήλοις [Refs 4th c.BC+]; commotiunculis, [Refs 1st c.BC+]; προσώποις, of a mimic dancer, [Refs 2nd c.AD+]; τοῖς τῆς ψυχῆς παθήμασι τὸ σῶμα σ. [Refs 4th c.BC+]; τοῖς ἀναπνευστικοῖς ὀργάνοις τὸ ἧπαρ σ. [Refs 2nd c.AD+]
__III have a fellow-feeling, sympathize, feel sympathy, [Refs 5th c.BC+]
vocabInfos.shortDef: to suffer with, share in suffering
vocabInfos.mediumDef: to suffer with, share in suffering, sympathize, 1Cor. 12:26; to suffer as another, endure corresponding sufferings, Rom. 8:17*
vocabInfos._es_Definition: sufrir juntos, compartir el mismo sufrimiento
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition: 一同受苦或受到相同的痛苦 (羅 8:17;林前 12:26)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition: 一同受苦或受到相同的痛苦 (罗 8:17;林前 12:26)
vocabInfos._vi_Definition: chịu đau đớn với; chịu khổ với. σύν (G4862) + πάσχω (G3958)
